# WhatsApp Bot - Exact Versions (Requirements Lock)
# Generated automatically - do not edit manually
# Use: npm install

## Core Dependencies
whatsapp-web.js@1.23.0
qrcode-terminal@0.12.0
express@4.18.2
dotenv@16.3.1
fs-extra@11.1.1

## Security & Middleware
cors@2.8.5
helmet@7.1.0

## Logging & Utilities
winston@3.11.0
moment@2.29.4
multer@1.4.5

## Development Tools
nodemon@3.0.1
eslint@8.55.0
prettier@3.1.0

## System Requirements
node>=16.0.0
npm>=8.0.0

## Installation Commands
# npm install --save whatsapp-web.js qrcode-terminal express dotenv fs-extra cors helmet winston moment multer
# npm install --save-dev nodemon eslint prettier

## Environment Setup
# 1. Create .env file
# 2. Set WhatsApp business details
# 3. Configure ports and settings
# 4. Run: npm start
